name: Feed My Belly 2
description:
Insane food grabbing fun!

A deceptively easy game that can challenge the fastest finger. Help Blob find food and fill up his belly!

Simply tap blob to jump high and catch the yummy flying fruit avoiding hitting his friends. Hurdle over oncoming boulders to keep Blob alive.

Your challenge is to Feed my Belly!

• High quality graphics.
• Fun Sounds
• Easy gameplay with progressive difficulty

Keep up to date at www.twitter.com/cl_apps_

Thanks for supporting original, British made, independent iOS app development – your feedback is much appreciated!
